title: Cafe Verona
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has an extensive menu, of which some dishes are vegan, including appetizers - vegetable spring rolls, hummus, eggplant dpi; salads - quinoa and tofu, a Havana salad; pasta vegan choices such as rice noodles with vegetables and Chinese mushrooms. Also has a quince stuffed with rice, vegetables and walnuts that is vegan. Twice a week the menu of the day is vegan. Offers soy milk. Wi-fi. Smoking is allowed and there are only four non smoking tables which are not far from the smoking section.
